job_tasks.phrase: Write clean, high-performance code used by thousands of teachers and students, ensuring it works well for everyone.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the core activity of writing code for a software product.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with different cross-functional teams to smoothly add new features and improvements to our software.
job_tasks.justification: This describes collaboration within a software development context to enhance existing products.

job_tasks.phrase: Look for ways to make our solutions work well as more people use them and as technology changes.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a focus on scalability and adaptability of the software, aligning with operational considerations.

job_tasks.phrase: Take responsibility for making sure our team's solutions are really good, from start to finish.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights ownership and end-to-end responsibility for software solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Try out new tools and technologies to make our software better, and help add new things to what we already use.
job_tasks.justification: This involves incorporating new technologies into the existing software development process.

job_tasks.phrase: Help newer developers learn and grow by showing them the ropes and sharing what you know.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes mentoring and knowledge sharing, which are key aspects of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Work closely with different cross-functional teams
Look for ways to make our solutions work well as more people use them and as technology changes.
Take responsibility for making sure our team's solutions are really good, from start to finish.
Try out new tools and technologies to make our software better, and help add new things to what we already use.
Help newer developers learn and grow by showing them the ropes and sharing what you know.

classification.rationale: The job description mentions 'OpenAI & LLM' and implies working with new technologies. However, the core responsibilities and listed technologies are heavily focused on traditional software development and operations. There is no specific emphasis on designing, fine-tuning, or deploying generative models, which are hallmarks of a GenAI Engineer.
